== User Guide ==
* Pick an instance for your account
** [https://instances.mastodon.xyz/ Instance recommendations]
** [https://instances.mastodon.xyz/list Full list of instances]
** [[UI_previews|UI Previews]]
* Have a look the public stream of an instance at [http://www.unmung.com/mastoview Mastoview]

* List of mastodon apps at [https://github.com/tootsuite/documentation/blob/master/Using-Mastodon/Apps.md github.com]
